p: Additionally, carrageenan-induced paw edema lasts for 72 h and after that time only a hypernociceptive process remains ( 37). Although it was not the object of our investigation to evaluate the entire time course of carrageenan-induced paw edema, we observed that a single dose of EOHc (100 mg/kg) was able to prevent edema increase up to 24 h of observation.
